ComicInfo.Title: A TV Commercial You'll Never See; One Fine Day in the Sierra Madre Bicycle Shop; The Ham That Rocks the Cradle; Next Years' Real Life Shows; The Fast Food Wars; Some Improvement; Plastic Surgery of the Cartoon Stars; Cracked's Big City Gift Catalog; Lost Again on the Great American Desert; Book Reports of the Rich and Famous; Spies and Saboteurs Hit TV; Magazines for the Psychologically Disturbed; Candidates We'd Like to See Run Against President Bush; An Evening in the Big City; Wayne's Hurled
ComicInfo.Summary: The bicycle shop doesn't sell patches.
